text: Pratyeka jyanale mrtyuko svada cakhnu parnecha ra timila'i kiyamatako dina timra kriyakalapaharuko purapura pratiphala pradana garine cha, tasartha juna manisala'i narkako agobata tadha rakhinecha ra svargama pravesa gara'inecha, niscaya nai uhi saphala hunecha ra sansarika jivana ta bhramako samana matra ho
